room_title: Escape room "Pharaohâ€™s Curse" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
room_description:
Your rag-tag team of treasure hunters has stumbled upon obscured texts written by a shopkeeper intent on uncovering the secrets of the most mysterious tomb in Egypt. To your dismay, when you arrive in town you learn that the shopkeeper went missing months ago. His shop has been closed ever since.
Your team is going to sneak in, search his shop, and utilize what you find to sieze the untold fortune that is said to be within the tomb. Will this tomb deliver on its reputation of housing incredible riches, or will it hold unspeakable dangers?
